scripts.prepublish: yarn run gen:names && yarn run build
scripts.build: yarn run build:spritesheet && yarn run build:parcel
scripts.postbuild: cp src/js/SVGIconNames.json js/SVGIconNames.json && cp dist/icons-sprite.svg js/icons-sprite.svg
scripts.build:spritesheet: yarn run optimize-svgs && yarn run create-svg-sprite
scripts.preview: yarn run build:spritesheet && sed -i'' 's/<footer>/<!-- footer/;s/<\/footer>/-->/' dist/sprite.symbol.html && parcel serve dist/sprite.symbol.html
